headline: Schooled
abstract: In “Slaying Goliath,” the veteran public-education activist celebrates the defeat of efforts to introduce federal education standards and testing into public schools and expand charters.
lead_paragraph: SLAYING GOLIATHThe Passionate Resistance to Privatization and the Fight to Save America’s SchoolsBy Diane Ravitch
keywords: Slaying Goliath: The Passionate Resistance to Privatization and the Fight to Save America's Schools (Book)
